data.title: Doo! and WWE: Curse of the Speed Demon

When Scooby-Doo and the gang head to Paris on vacation, things take a turn when Scooby-Doo and Shaggy end up in the Himalayas instead. They find themselves facing the Abominable Snowmonster, while the rest of the gang are looking for them.

Mindy Cohn

He soon sets his eyes on Daphne as his bride, leaving the team scrambling to save her.
